name: productivity-command-center
description: A strict routine enforcer and productivity dashboard with SQL backend

scripts.reset-db: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dbPath = path.join(__dirname, 'data', 'productivity.db'); if (fs.existsSync(dbPath)) { fs.unlinkSync(dbPath); console.log('Database deleted'); } else { console.log('No database to delete'); }"
